title: Ep. 39: “How the F do I make friends as an adult?!” Friendship + Galentine’s Day
itunes:title: Ep. 39: “How the F do I make friends as an adult?!” Friendship + Galentine’s Day
description:
Happy Galentine’s Day! We are celebrating this girl power holiday by going on a friend-date and of course, hanging out with you! We are answering the age old question… “How the F do I make friends as an adult?!” Plus, how to set boundaries with friends, balancing boyfriends and gal pals, how cupcakes can mend friend fallouts, and how to have a successful long-distance friendship.

Also in this episode, Becca is obsessed with her new Halogen sweater, and Grace is loving the Instagram account History Cool Kids.

 

Sponsors:

LOLA: for 40% off all subscriptions, visit mylola.com and enter code BOP at checkout

Care/of: use code BOP to 25% off your first month of personalized vitamins at TakeCareOf.com
